des:
*** UPDATE***

We have added support for Māori language - now you can learn and entertain at the same time!

From the Twisted Tales library, Red Riding Hood is an immersive interactive story for kids that lets you – the listener – play the part of Red Riding Hood OR the Big Bad Wolf, living the stories from their point of view!

Red Riding Hood is walking through the woods, taking a lovely meal to her ailing grandmother. She has been warned about the big bad wolf, but when she meets a shaggy stranger, he insists he is the big good wolf. Should she trust him? You decide. Will she survive the meeting? It’s all up to you.

Currently there are two stories available. To play them, just say:

“Alexa, open Red Riding Hood” or
“Alexa, open Hansel & Gretel”

Twisted Tales include:
* Multiple choices and alternative endings
* Possibility to play story from Red Riding Hood AND Big Bad Wold point of view
* Professional voice acting
* Immersive music
* Flawless sound effects

Māori version of the story was funded by Perpetual Guardian Trust New Zealand.

For more stories please search for Sonnar Interactive in your Alexa app.
